short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for developers of Chrome TTS engine extensions to help them test their engines are implementing the API correctly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're a developer working on a text-to-speech (TTS) extension for Chrome, this app gives you a test suite to make sure your extension is working properly. It has a combination of manual tests that you can listen to, and automated tests that use callback timing information to make sure things are working correctly.

This extension is open-source. The source code is available at:
http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/trunk/samples.html#chrome.tts
